alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 8:15PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida...Alabama... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:05 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to 17.2 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2 feet on 04/27/2019. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
